justification: Offer misreads Team B’s conservative, floor-focused profile. Proposes a high-variance WR with declining role plus a mid-tier rookie RB (tough playoff slate) for B’s steady Tier-2 RB with friendly schedule—opposite of B’s values and urgent win-now needs. Rationale is A-centric and generic, with little reference to B’s preferences or expert-consensus tendencies. Mechanically coherent but strategically mismatched; 0.35 acceptance is optimistic.
